abstract: Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani, Iraq's most important Shiite cleric, calls for immediate release of 26 Qatari hunters, including members of Qatar's royal family, who were abducted while on safari in Iraq; no group has claimed responsibility for kidnapping.
lead_paragraph: Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani called the kidnapping wrong and said the government must help free the abducted hunters.

headline.main: Iraq: Leading Cleric Urges Release of Kidnapped Qatari Hunters
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iraq: Leading Cleric Demands Release of Qatari Hunters Kidnapped on Safari

snippet: Grand Ayatollah Ali al-Sistani called the kidnapping wrong and said the government must help free the abducted hunters.
